item.title: ‘Thunderbolts*’ Sets Disney+ Streaming Release Date
item.description: Marvel fans looking to get another glimpse of the newest Avengers can check out “Thunderbolts*” on Disney+ beginning Aug. 27. Featuring Florence Pugh, Sebastian Stan, Lewis Pullman, Wyatt

item.title: ‘Frankenstein in Romania’: Sebastian Stan Set to Star in Film That Radu Jude Is Writing
item.description: The free-spirited iconoclast also plans to next shoot a movie “about immigration and about Romanians working abroad.”
